comment: Very strict. no easy online teacher. you will die by the end doing homework. He assigns so much homework for no reason. NEVER take HIM at all. You will spend your whole semester doing homework. SAVE YOURSELF and do not take him. he should be FIRED because he wants his students to FAIL. the final exam is in person!!!!!!!!!!!

so much  HOMEWORK for no reason. DO NOT TAKE HIM. worst professor ever. He gives you 7 homework with 25 problems each then you take a quiz. Then that quiz unlocks 7 more homework with 25 problems each. Someone needs to fire him.

If you are not a good online learner, do not take this class! The course material is comprised off textbook readings and my math lab homework...a lot of homework. If you are a good online learner, here is what you need to know: ignore the study plan, focus homework and tests. Lastly, he is not flexible with deadlines and will not round your grade.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Overall the class wasn't very hard but the communication was awful, very unprofessional emails and wouldn't respond in a timely matter. Way too much homework.

I took his online class and really struggled in his class. I am usually not bad at math but his class had no lectures just reading the textbooks and MyLab. It was very self-teach yourself from MyLab homework. He gives a LOT of homework by the way. You have 4 exams and only the final is proctored.

I took his online class so I can not say what he was like in person however I did not really enjoy his class. All of the work you learn is from the textbook and your homework is all on MyLab Math. And it is a LOT of homework. You have 4 exams and only the final is proctored. I hated how he would not give you a lot of days to finish the exam.
His strong suit is making the class interesting and fun. My only wish is that he applied the math more to real-world applications. Not a bad choice for a professor.
Its not an easy A, but he does everything to help you get there. Ask for help he has no problem giving it and make sure to do the extra credit assignment!!
Multiple choice test, 60 extra credit points added to your lowest test, unlimited tries on homework. got an A and I made B's on my exams
Easy class. Hilarious teacher. Very engaging! Not very much homework at all. Not a large workload. Good teacher, good class.

Really nice, funny guy with a simple but effective teaching style. He likes to joke and tell stories which make his lectures more palatable. This isn't necessarily an easy class, but if you show up, pay attention, and work on your homework in a timely manner, you shouldn't struggle to succeed. I would highly recommend him for this class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Hilarious

comment: Mr. Schafer is one of the best professors I've ever had. I've never enjoyed math, or been very good at it, but he made calculus enjoyable and easy. He is really funny and explains things really well. He gives homework on my math lab and the tests are a lot easier than the HW. If you go to class and study, you could 100% make an A or B.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Overall, not a very hard class. As long as you stay on top of your work and understand math you should be fine. But if youre not the best at math: choose someone else. Hes terrible at email communication. Wont ever respond. Tests are straightforward and based off homework. 4 tests, and cumulative final. And homework counts as test grade.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: He is very good at making sure you understand what he is teaching before moving on! He gives you mathlab assignments that are due the night before a test, and the test are all multiple choice! He is a great professor compared to some ive had in the past!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT--Hilarious

comment: He's very funny and takes time to answer questions. Has 4 tests plus a final and the homework counts as a test grade. If you show up to class, he replaces the lowest test grade with that of the final up to a 90. He will call you out so pay attention. Do the homework and go to class you should get a B. Tests are multiple choice. Offers extra credit.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: The math lab HW is a nightmare for this class, but the tests are easy compared to it, so if you attempt to get the homework done and you go to class, you should be prepared for them. Sometimes he gives out reviews for the tests- DO THOSE!

Awesome professor! super funny and caring of his students. Calls on people a lot so don't fall asleep. Material is tough but as long as you study you should be fine. Mymathlab will save you on the tests and randomly some days there will be extra credit, so don't skip. Calculus is nowhere near easy but he made the class enjoyable while learning.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: He reads through the power points very fast and if you ask him to explain then he just rereads exactly what he said before slower. The class is 4 tests and HW worth 15% each, and final worth 25%. You don't need the textbook but you do need mymathlab access. He doesn't teach well so if you struggle with math dont take him. All test are MC

his funny but if you bad at math like me then DO NoT TAKE THIS class. he teach so fast and half of the time I barely know what his talking about. he expect you to know the material. he doesn't care. Do not take this class if you bad at math. his funny and all but he can't teach. I have to go youtube and my mathlab to teach myself.

This is the only time I have rated a professor, because I want to warn people. If you are not GOOD at math do not take him. I have always been slightly above avg at math and started failing this class. Overcomplicates lessons. Asks students to answer questions when none of us had any clue what to do. Does not post PowerPoints.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: The worst professor. EVER.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Unless youre extremely good at math, do not take this professor. Not only is the class difficult, he is rude to students and doesnt seem to care about their well being. Extremely boring and rude.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Hilarious guy. He makes kind of dorky dad-jokes, but they really lighten up the class and make it interesting. His lecture style can get a little boring at times, but it's not hard to follow. Tests are all multiple choice and not too difficult. If you pay attention and do the homework on MyMathLab, you'll pass for sure.

THE BEST MATH PROFESSOR I HAVE EVER HAD. He really cares about his students and their success as long as they do also and he notices when you are always there for class. 4 tests and a final that are all multiple choice along with my math lab assignments for each section. His lectures are very helpful with lots of examples and places to ask ?s.

Mr. Schafer is a great instructor. He wants everyone to understand the material and to do well on the tests. He enjoys teaching and answering questions from students. He also loves to crack jokes in class. Just to the homework in a timely manner and attend the classes and you will be successful.

Schafer is a good professor overall, especially if you are good at math. He talks fast and writes kinda sloppy but he will go back and explain again if you ask. His homework is extremely helpful for the tests and at the end of the semester it counts as a test grade. If you are not good at math, I would recommend taking a different professor.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Hilarious

comment: If you're good at math, take him. If you struggle with math, DO NOT take him. He isn't a good teacher, but he is nice. I struggled, but maybe you won't. If you have another choice of a teacher take them instead. If he is your only choice then good luck.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LECTURE HEAVY--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: DO NOT TAKE! AVOID AT ALL COSTS! He is the worst. He over complicates every lesson he attempts to teach and confuses all students in the class. The only way I learned is from My Math Lab. If you are not a math genius I would not recommend taking his class at all. He is very nice and funny, but that is about it.

Guys, do not believe the bad reviews and the 4.0 level of difficulty. I do think that it depends on how good you are at math but he's beyond willing to explain everything. You get a "study" sheet for every test. He reopens the hw assignments FOR CREDIT at the end of the semester. I skipped every class except for test day and maybe a study sesh.
I really enjoyed his class. He keeps the atmosphere light by making jokes now and then. Don't be afraid to ask him for help.

Schafer is not a bad teacher, though it also depends on how good you are at math. I enjoy math and am pretty good at it so I haven't found this class hard. The only thing I don't care about are the 6 pop quizzes, though he does drop the lowest. He's a funny guy, really entertaining. I would say, if you are good at math, he's a good choice.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Hilarious

comment: I struggled through the class not understanding his way of teaching. Homework was unbearable but I learned more through MYMATH then the teacher.

A funny guy who is really terrible at teaching. It's like he expects you to already know calculus coming into the class. I dropped this class early on because he moves far too fast through his "slides" (worksheets that he projects) and if you are bad at math, DON'T TAKE THIS CLASS!

DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!!! i am not good at math at all, so if you are good it might be a different story. I usually left his class more confused than ever. He expects you to already know how to do the problems. Goes wayyy to fast and doesn't go through problems step by step. He has horrible handwriting too. I actually ended up dropping his class.

Very funny guy. Moves way too quickly over slides and can't really read his handwriting or math problems. MyMathlab helps a lot. I did very well in this class because I had a great high school trig teacher. If i hadn't known the material before hand I might have failed the class due to his lack of clarity and fast paced lecture.

Mr. Schafer was a very funny professor but was NO help at all. He took forever to respond to emails, had terrible hand writing and moved past slides waaayyyy too fast. Don't bother buying the text book. If you buy the MyMathLab access code, there is an html ebook online. Tests/Quizzes were very hard. I would not recommend taking him.

he is a real funny guy but teaching trig wasn't the easiest to understand from him. he is better than other trig professors ive heard about. mymathlab reallllly helps you in the areas he falls short. quizzes are easy as long as you've done the homework and studied, tests are kind of hard so you have to study.

He's a great, hilarious guy and his classes are fun but teaching-wise he's awful. His handwriting is abysmal and he's quick to move on. Couldn't keep up and ultimately couldn't learn anything in classes. I had to resort to MyMathLab examples to teach me. If you're not good at math like me, skip this class, you wont get an understanding of it here.

Hilarious guy, horrible teacher. Uses print-outs to teach and points at it to teach. Doesn't go through step by step. MyMathLab is how you learn the material. Don't take this class if you're bad at math (like me). Also likes to point out the same person to answer questions every class.

Professor probably should retire. He is a funny guy, but he doesn't bother using actual trig terms and loses track of what he is saying.   Commonly refers to equations as cute and magnificent.  Likes saying holy shoes! And happier than a pig in yogurt! Lessons are unclear and he isn't good with tech. Don't take his class!

You really need to be good at math do keep up. He's fast but if you ask questions he does his best to help and will always do his best to make sure you get it. Doing the homework is the best way to learn the material. He's sarcastic and funny and a goofy old fart but is a really nice guy.
Too hard but got a b

I will make this short. If you are not good at math already, do not take this class. I find myself leaving class more confused than I do on the homework. Copying notes is hard to do as he goes through the slides fast, which are straight out of the textbook. Also, he does take attendance and will call on people, so expect to answer questions.
